alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wayne, southwestern Lewis, Cayuga and Oswego Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1228 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fair Haven Beach State Park to 9 miles east of Central Square. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Pulaski, Central Square, Redfield, Cato, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Brewerton, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo and Sterling. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
